oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Government Boulevard on Missionary Ridge, near Chattanooga, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color tinted and enhanced photograph of Government Boulevard on Missionary Ridge in Chattanooga. A tower is visible in the distance. Features a divided back and narrative on reverse. Postcard made in the United States of America. [No. R-29708]
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Missionary Ridge (Tenn. and Ga.); Chattanooga (Tenn.); Hamilton County (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Roads; Mountains; Trees; Towers
